title: Retrieve geocodification
name: PostGeocode
description: You'll need to post an array of address objects to retrieve the geocode data.

Parameter.description: The address code that comes from your own system.
Street/Avenue of the address, without number and neighborhood.
Here you enter, if exists, the weight (kg) of the delivery.
Here you enter, if exists, the volume (m³) of the delivery.
Start time of your delivery daily window.
End time of your delivery daily window.

title: Create new job
name: PostJob
description: Make sure do you have at least a routing done before create a job.

Error 4xx.description: Trying to create a job that already exists.

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:

title: API Login
name: ApiLogin
description: API authentication. Keep the cookie generated as if it were originated from a browser. Notice: this is a temporary method since we're moving to HTTPS+Apikey authentication.

title: Create an order
name: PostOrder
description: After geocoding your deliveries you'll need to create an order. Put your deliveries inside an array and make the request.

Parameter.description: Address without number and neighborhood. E.g: Av. Paulista.
State of where delivery deserves. E.g: SP.
Country of where delivery deserves. E.g: Brasil.
Geocode object retrieved from the geocoding request.

examples.title: Request-Example

title: Create new routing
name: PostRouting
description: Make sure do you have at least a vehicle, a depot and the required informations are all filled. Before to make a routing you need to have an order.

Parameter.description: Order ID from the order created before.
